name: Animal Kingdom: Coin Raid (itch)
description:
Associated with NarraSoft Corporation

A game I worked on the company.  

Animal Kingdom: Coin Raid is all about building islands, looting coins, attacking/stealing other player’s islands, and collecting animal cards to become coin master. The game also features minigames inside with different mechanics which rewards the player with energy, coins, gems, and minigame tickets.
